tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    currency_type VARCHAR(3),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    currency_type VARCHAR(3),
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
) PRIMARY KEY(transaction_id);

CREATE TABLE usd_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(10),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_balances(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE eur_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(10),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_balances(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE btc_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(10),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_balances(user_id)
);
